Class.ClassComment: PerCacheInboundInvocationHandler /** * Interface to invoke when a {@link org.infinispan.commands.remote.CacheRpcCommand} is received from other node in thelocal site. * @author Pedro Ruivo * @since 7.1 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Handles the {@link org.infinispan.commands.remote.CacheRpcCommand} from other node. * @param command the {@link org.infinispan.commands.remote.CacheRpcCommand} to handle- * @param reply the return value is passed to this object in order to be sent back to the sender * @param order the {@link org.infinispan.remoting.inboundhandler.DeliverOrder} in which the command was sent */
